= Details =

== Getting Started ==

  * Works with SageTV 7.1.9 
  
  * available as a "UI Mod" plugin under SageTV version 7+ called "ADM - Another Dynamic Menu"
  * works with Standard SageTV as well as with Diamond (see Diamond section below)
